Ying-Chaw-
	It is an interesting possibility. Opinion here seems to be "very  
highly unlikely." You can believe what you want but it is all  
speculation on your part which noone here seems to agree with. We all  
have our theories about our own stuff, some ideas we hold dearer than  
others.
	Milt will tell you that all true Muramasa blades were "made" into  
gimei (all signed Muramasa) to hide them from Tokugawa authorities  
and that he alone has discovered the secret for detecting them. He  
and you could be right, only time will tell. Lets just say you  
haven't convinced us...
-t

Where is Darcy Brockbank when we need him!?!?
